name: pjcofni

body.origin:
|- wfn(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), chba)
-| wf(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba, chba)
-| wf(cfv(cpjh, c1), chba, chba)

cumulated.origin:
|- wfn(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), chba)
-| wf(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba, chba)
-| wf(cfv(cpjh, c1), chba, chba)

body.origin:
|- wf(cfv(cpjh, c0), chba, chba)
-| wcel(c0, cch)

cumulated.origin:
|- wfn(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), chba)
-| wf(cfv(cpjh, c1), chba, chba)
-| wcel(c0, cch)

body.origin:
|- wf(cfv(cpjh, c1), chba, chba)
-| wcel(c1, cch)

cumulated.origin:
|- wfn(ccom(cfv(cpjh, c0), cfv(cpjh, c1)), chba)
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((projh ` c0)∘(projh ` c1))[Fn]~H
⊣ c0 ∈ CH
⊣ c1 ∈ CH

comment: Functionality of composition of projections. (Contributed by NM, 1-Oct-2000.) (New usage is discouraged.)
